abstract: Birth rates have fallen in the slow economy, BlackBerry glitches spread, picking the best iPhone 4S carrier and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: Birth rates have fallen in the slow economy, BlackBerry glitches spread, picking the best iPhone 4S carrier and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Thursday Reading: Fewer Babies in a Weak Economy
